verses.text: Let \w my|strong="H5921"\w* cry come \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*, O God; let \w your|strong="H5921"\w* ears \w be|strong="H1732"\w* open \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* prayer.

\w From|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* end \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* earth \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H8085"\w* send up \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w you|strong="H8085"\w*, \w when|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w heart|strong="H8085"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* overcome: take me \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* rock which \w is|strong="H0430"\w* over-high \w for|strong="H0430"\w* me.

\w For|strong="H7121"\w* \w you|strong="H4480"\w* \w have|strong="H0776"\w* \w been|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* secret \w place|strong="H0776"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w* tower \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w those|strong="H4480"\w* \w who|strong="H0776"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* war \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* tent \w my|strong="H1961"\w* resting-place \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* keep myself \w under|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* cover \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* wings. (Selah.)

\w For|strong="H0168"\w* \w you|strong="H5769"\w*, O God, have made answer \w to|strong="H0168"\w* \w my|strong="H0168"\w* prayers; \w you|strong="H5769"\w* have \w given|strong="H5643"\w* \w me|strong="H5769"\w* \w the|strong="H2620"\w* heritage \w of|strong="H0168"\w* those who give honour \w to|strong="H0168"\w* \w your|strong="H5769"\w* name.

\w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king long life; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w make|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* years go \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w through|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* generations.

\w May|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* seat \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w authority|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H3254"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* God \w for|strong="H5921"\w* ever; \w may|strong="H4428"\w* mercy \w and|strong="H4428"\w* righteousness \w keep|strong="H3254"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* safe.

\w So|strong="H3427"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* I make songs \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w praise|strong="H5769"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* name \w for|strong="H0430"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*, giving \w to|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w that|strong="H0430"\w* which \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w right|strong="H0571"\w* day \w by|strong="H6440"\w* day.
